TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss 4.63 vs loss 2.43 Net loss 60,780,000 vs loss 28,898,000 Rev 499.7 mln vs 432.1 mln NOTE: 1986 net includes loss of 49.9 mln dlrs for restructuring charges.
